mapper.select: SELECT id, name, path, parent_id, icon, order_num, role, component, status FROM menu WHERE role = #{role} AND status = 'ENABLE' ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT id, name, path, parent_id, icon, order_num, role, component, status FROM menu ORDER BY parent_id ASC, order_num ASC
SELECT id, name, path, parent_id, icon, order_num, role, component, status FROM menu WHERE parent_id = #{id} AND status = 'ENABLE' ORDER BY order_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (name, path, parent_id, icon, order_num, role, component, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{path}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{orderNum}, #{role}, #{component}, #{status})
